The interactions measurement is equivalent to buzz, or how much the gaming community is talking about and playing a given game. Source: Networked Insights...

snippet.title: The Fifth Estate : Come for the Cumberbatch, not WikiLeaks insight
snippet.description: ...If you like movies, The Fifth Estateis for you. The latest in a string of WikiLeaks-related films opens on October 18, and it has all the makings of classic, sugar-candy Hollywood: there's the top-line lead (Benedict Cumberbatch, who has played Khan, Sherlock,and nowAssange), some dramatic liberties with history in the name of drama (Russian spies pre-Manning, a dramatic border crossing that...

snippet.title: Angling to develop for Google Glass? Google gives some insight
snippet.description: ...If youre looking for a taste of what it will be like to develop for Google Glass, the company posted a video demonstrating the hardware and a little bit of the API on Thursday. Timothy Jordan, a senior developer advocate at Google, gave a talk at SXSW in early March that lasted just shy of an hour and gave a look into the platform.Google Glass bears more similarity to the Web than the Android mob...

snippet.title: Five insights into the behaviors of social media users
snippet.description: ...We do a decent amount of social media coverage here at Ars, but not everything that happens with Facebook, Twitter, and the like is worth its own story. Sometimes, though, we happen across things that make us say "huh, that's interesting." It turns out there are a lot of things we thought we knew about social media users, but not all of them are true. Here are a few tidbits we gath...

snippet.title: Verizon seeks customers to spam with mobile marketing forever
snippet.description: ...Verizon is starting to contact customers this week about allowing the telecom to sell their dataincluding location, browsing information, and mobile app usageto third-party marketers in exchange for coupons. The company promises one coupon up front, with the potential for e-mails, texts, snail mail, or mobile ads with more offers based on the data collected.The program is called Verizon Selects a...

snippet.title: Researchers trap antihydrogen for insight into our matter-dominated universe
snippet.description: ...How different are matter and antimatter? This is a question that gets at the heart of modern particle physics and early-universe cosmology. The objects of everyday experience are made of ordinary matter. While some natural process produce limited amounts of antimatter, every known star and galaxy appears to be matter-based.If matter and antimatter are physical mirrors of each other, then an atom ...
